data.eml:eml: Ten new species of the Stegana (Steganina) shirozui species group (Diptera, Drosophilidae) from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Xi-Peng, Chen, Hong-Wei (2012): Ten new species of the Stegana (Steganina) shirozui species group (Diptera, Drosophilidae) from China. Zootaxa 3333: 24-37, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.215439
